title: When the Sons of Heaven Meet the Daughters of the Earth
description: From the author of Low Tide and His Devils comes a brilliant novel about the high-flying New York art world of the late 1980s. When a brash young artist enters the lives of a couple of well-to-do patrons of the arts, the excessiveness of everything begins to threaten what is most dear to them.
author: Fernanda Eberstadt
